title: Brother-in-law held in shooting of Tempe girl, 16
content:
A 16-year-old girl died Monday night after being shot in the head as her brother-in-law attempted to get the gun back from her, Tempe police said.
She was identified Tuesday as Marlen Hernandez.
Emmanuel Hilerio, 23, was arrested on suspicion of manslaughter, Lt. Mike Pooley, Tempe police spokesman, said Tuesday.
The accident occurred in an apartment complex in the 1000 block of East Orange Street, near Rural Road and University Drive, police said.
According to police, the girl was handling the handgun and Hilerio attempted to retrieve the handgun from her. Hilerio accidentally discharged the gun, Pooley said.
Tempe Fire Medical Rescue attempted life-saving efforts, and the girl was transported to a hospital, where she was declared deceased, Pooley said.
